hero.title: Transforming Ideas into Technology Solutions
hero.subtitle: We deliver cutting-edge software solutions to help businesses thrive in the digital era

about.title: About CrossGo
about.description: CrossGo is a leading software development company specializing in custom software solutions, cross-platform development, AI integration and object tracking technologies. With years of experience, we help businesses transform their ideas into reality.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a wide range of services to help businesses leverage technology for growth and innovation

custom_software.title: Full-Stack Web Development
custom_software.description: From front-end to back-end, we build secure, scalable web applications tailored to your business needs.

cross_platform.title: Cross-Platform Development
cross_platform.description: Build applications that work seamlessly across Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android.

ai_integration.title: AI & LLM Integration
ai_integration.description: AI chatbots, vision systems, and on-device LLMs to enhance automation, personalization, and offline intelligence.

object_tracking.title: AR & Object Tracking
object_tracking.description: 2D tracking and AR solutions for mobile, Meta Quest, and Apple Vision Pro, enabling interactive and immersive experiences.

expertise.title: Technical Expertise
expertise.description: Our team consists of skilled developers with expertise in various technologies.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: We follow rigorous testing procedures to ensure high-quality deliverables.

support.title: Continuous Support
support.description: We provide ongoing maintenance and support for all our solutions.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Ideas?
cta.description: Contact us today to discuss how we can help your business grow with our technology solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.main_paragraph: We are a software company specializing in providing modern technology solutions that help businesses optimize workflows, enhance user experience, and leverage the power of artificial intelligence.
about.mission: At CrossGo, we believe that technology should work for people, not the other way around. Our mission is to create intuitive, powerful software that solves real problems and creates meaningful impact.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new technologies and approaches

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work closely with clients to understand their needs

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for quality in everything we deliver

mission_statement.title: Our Mission
mission_statement.description: To deliver innovative and reliable software solutions that empower businesses to achieve their goals.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading provider of cutting-edge technology solutions that drive business transformation.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the talented individuals behind our success.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Comprehensive technology solutions tailored to your business needs

custom_software.title: Full-Stack Web Development
custom_software.description: We deliver modern web applications with responsive frontends, robust backends, and secure infrastructure. From dashboards to ecommerce platforms, we handle the entire web stack.

cross_platform.title: Cross-Platform Development
cross_platform.description: Develop once, deploy everywhere. Our cross-platform apps run seamlessly on Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android with consistent UI and performance.

ai_integration.title: AI & LLM Integration
ai_integration.description: We integrate AI features like chatbots trained on your business data, offline LLMs, computer vision for defect detection, and speech-to-text for automation.
benefits: Chatbots tailored to your platforms (FB, TikTok, Shopee, Line, etc.)
LLMs running locally with your own data
AI vision systems for real-time defect detection

object_tracking.title: AR & Object Tracking
object_tracking.description: We build advanced AR experiences and 2D tracking solutions for all camera-enabled devices, including wearables like Meta Quest and Apple Vision Pro.
benefits: Supports Android, iOS, Meta Quest, and Apple Vision Pro
Enhanced interactivity for marketing, training, and education

portfolio.title: Our Portfolio
portfolio.description: Explore some of our recent projects and success stories

fashion.title: Fashion Retail Platform
fashion.description: A multi-platform shopping experience with AI-powered recommendations and visual search.

surveillance.title: Smart Surveillance System
surveillance.description: An intelligent security solution with real-time object tracking and behavior analysis.

medical.title: Medical Diagnostic Assistant
medical.description: An AI-powered tool that helps healthcare professionals analyze medical images and diagnose conditions.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Ready to transform your ideas into technology solutions? Reach out to discuss your project or learn more about our services.
